DashboardBody.Fn::Sub: {    "widgets": [        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 0,            "y": 0,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/ApiGateway", "Latency", "ApiName", "${APIGateWay}" ],                    [ ".", "4XXError", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right" } ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "API GateWay Latency,Errors"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 12,            "y": 0,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/ES", "FreeStorageSpace", "DomainName", "${ESDomain}", "ClientId", "${AWS::AccountId}", { "period": 60 } ],                    [ ".", "SearchableDocuments", ".", ".", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right", "period": 60 } ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "ElasticSearch Documents/FreeSpace"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 6,            "y": 0,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/CloudFront", "Requests", "Region", "Global", "DistributionId", "${Distribution}" ],                    [ ".", "BytesDownloaded", ".", ".", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right" } ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "CloudFront Request/BytesDownloaded"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 18,            "y": 0,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Lex", "MissedUtteranceCount", "BotVersion", "$LATEST", "Operation", "PostText", "BotName", "${BotName}" ],                    [ ".", "RuntimeSucessfulRequestLatency", ".", ".", ".", ".", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right" } ],                    [ ".", "RuntimeRequestCount", ".", ".", ".", ".", ".", "." ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "Lex Utterances/Latency"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 0,            "y": 6,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Lambda", "Errors", "FunctionName", "${AdminLambda}", { "stat": "Sum" } ],                    [ ".", "Invocations", ".", ".", { "stat": "Sum" } ],                    [ ".", "Duration", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right" } ],                    [ ".", "Throttles", ".", ".", { "stat": "Sum" } ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "Admin Lambda",                "period": 300            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 6,            "y": 6,            "width": 6,            "height": 6,            "properties": {                "view": "timeSeries",                "stacked": false,                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Lambda", "Throttles", "FunctionName", "${FulfilmentLambda}", { "stat": "Sum" } ],                    [ ".", "Errors", ".", ".", { "stat": "Sum" } ],                    [ ".", "Invocations", ".", ".", { "stat": "Sum" } ],                    [ ".", "Duration", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right" } ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "Fulfilment Lambda",                "period": 300            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 18,            "y": 9,            "width": 6,            "height": 3,            "properties": {                "view": "singleValue",                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Route53", "HealthCheckPercentageHealthy", "HealthCheckId", "${AdminBucketHealthCheck}" ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "AdminBucket /health.html"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 12,            "y": 6,            "width": 6,            "height": 3,            "properties": {                "view": "singleValue",                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Route53", "HealthCheckPercentageHealthy", "HealthCheckId", "${CloudFrontAPIHealth}" ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "Cloudfront /api/health"            }        },        {            "type": "metric",            "x": 18,            "y": 6,            "width": 6,            "height": 3,            "properties": {                "view": "singleValue",                "metrics": [                    [ "AWS/Route53", "HealthCheckPercentageHealthy", "HealthCheckId", "${CloudFrontAdminHealth}" ]                ],                "region": "${AWS::Region}",                "title": "CloudFront /health.html"            }        }    ]}
